channel.title: Poptropica Flashpoint Curation
channel.description: Recent content on Poptropica Flashpoint Curation

item.title: Credits
item.description:
Special Thanks to the Following for making this Project Possible:

  • Poptropica | For making this Game
  • Light (hauntii)
  • Prof.Robin (danr789)

Poptropica Realms’ Svadilfari used in this Website Belongs to Poptropica and Sandbox Networks

For Takedowns, please go to the Takedowns Page.

item.title: Known Bugs/Issues
item.description:
All Known Bugs and/or Limitations of this Curation have been listed here

  • Character Importer does not work
  • The Store and Daily Pop Do not work yet
  • Common Rooms cannot be used to play multiplayer, as the curation has no backend.
  • The Login Screen Bugs out at times, especially if you have entered a Common Room by not showing any account or a way to make a new one.

item.title: Old Installation Instructions
item.description:
A Flashpoint curation containing both AS2 and AS3 islands

Installation

  • Firstly, Install 7Zip
  • Then Download and Unzip Flashpoint Core (You’re free to use Flashpoint Core 12, not tested though)
  • Download the AS3 Flashpoint Curation
  • Open up Flashpoint Core and go to the Curate tab and press Load Archive
  • Wait for the Curation to Load
  • Scroll Down and Press Run to start the Game!

NOTE: This is still being continously tested, so feel free to drop by for support or any bugs you encounter along the way on Poptropica Fan Club Discord Server

item.title: Takedowns
item.description:
Feel Free to contact any of the developers via the following means:

Prof.Robin : He can be contacted via Discord on SirPerson#7730 or Email

Light : He can be contacted via Discord on light#9585

In using both of the methods above, you’ll be asked to verify by emailing them with an official (username)@poptropica.com email, within 48 Hours this site will be taken down

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description:
Refer to this Page incase you get an error or Bug

Softlocks while Loading

This can easily be fixed by opening the developer menu by pressing the tilde key (~) and running the following command:

loadScene game.scenes.hub.tutorial2.Tutorial2

This Will Teleport you to the Home Island, from where you can go back to the Map

Blank White Screen while trying to Run The Game

For this, you’ll need to download base.php (right click and press “Save as..”) then open flashpoint, press Open Folder on the AS3 Curation and go into the content folder and then into the www.poptropica.com folder, delete the base.php file and replace it with this one.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description:
Simple Answers to Questions which you may have

Can I modify my costumes in the newer Curation?

Yes! It’s possible using the setPart command in the Developer Console. IN-COMPLETE

How do I open the Developer Console?

By pressing the tilde (~) key. On most keyboards its shift + (the key beside 1 on the left)

Can I move my Savedata around onto another PC?

Yes. For this, these are it’s instructions:

  • Press Win + R and type %appdata%\Macromedia\Flash Player\#SharedObjects
  • Go into the Alphanumerical Junk named folder
  • Copy the ```www.poptropica.com`` folder
  • On the other device, run the curation and setup a new character
  • Close the curation
  • Go to the %appdata%\Macromedia\Flash Player\#SharedObjects folder and inside that alphanumrical folder.
  • Delete the www.poptropica.com folder and replace with the one you copied.
  • Done!

How do I delete my account?

  • Press Win + R and type %appdata%\Macromedia\Flash Player\#SharedObjects
  • Go into the Alphanumerical Junk named folder
  • Delete the www.poptropica.com folder

Help! The Poptropica Curation doesn’t seem to work on my Macbook

Macbook Support is very limited when it comes to Flashpoint. As well, the curation has never seemed to work well when we tried it on Macbooks.

item.title: Installation Instructions
item.description:
A Flashpoint curation containing both AS2 and AS3 islands

Installation

  • Download and Install Flashpoint Infinity
  • Head over to the Games tab
  • Search for Poptropica in the search bar
  • Wait for the Curation to Download
  • Press the Pencil Button in the upper right corner
  • Edit the Launch Command to http://www.poptropica.com/base.php?room=FlashpointStart
  • Press Run to start the Game!

NOTE: This is still being continously tested, so feel free to drop by for support or any bugs you encounter along the way on Poptropica Fan Club Discord Server
